# Introduction to getting data

This section focusses on accessing and downloading WATLAS data. This is done using functions in the [WATLAS Utilities package](https://github.com/pratikunterwegs/watlasUtils).

## Prepare `watlasUtils` and other libraries

```{r install_watlasutils}
# install the package watlasUtils from master branch
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("pratikunterwegs/watlasUtils", ref = "master")

```
